Overview

HackerRank integrates with LinkedIn Talent Hub to facilitate a seamless and efficient candidate screening process for recruiters. As part of their interview workflow, LinkedIn users can directly send HackerRank Test invites to candidates and obtain the Test report for further evaluation.

This article provides you with detailed configuration steps on HackerRank and LinkedIn.

  • Prerequisites
  • Authorizing LinkedIn Integration with HackerRank Screen
  • Configuring the Setting on the HackerRank Platform
  • Authorizing LinkedIn Integration with HackerRank Interviews

Prerequisites

In HackerRank for Work In LinkedIn Talent Hub
  • You must own an Enterprise plan with a Recruiter license.
  • You must have an activated Recruiter-type user account with Company Admin permissions.
  • Log in with this user account.
  • You must have relevant administrative permissions to the Integrations page.

Authorizing LinkedIn Integration with HackerRank Screen

When configuring the LinkedIn integration with HackerRank Screen for the first time, the company administrator must authorize the integration.

  1. Log in to LinkedIn Talent Hub with the Company Admin user account.
  2. On the upper-right corner of the LinkedIn page, hover over your profile and click Product Settings.
  3. On the left pane, click Integrations.
  4. In the Available Integrations, click Authorize against HackerRank for Screen.The Authorize HackerRank Screen window is displayed.
  5. Click Authorize. This will redirect you to HackerRank's platform for authorization.
  6. You will need to log in as the company administrator to authorize the integration.
  7. After you log in, the Authorization required window is displayed.
  8. To continue with the authorization, click Authorize. This will result in the authorization of HackerRank Screen on the LinkedIn Talent Hub platform.
  9. On the LinkedIn Talent Hub, refresh the page and you will see that HackerRank Screen displays as On under Authorized integrations.

  10. After you have authorized HackerRank Screen, you can Deauthorize by clicking Edit against the Authorized integration.

Configuring the Setting on the HackerRank Platform

After you authorize the integration on LinkedIn Talent Hub, you can configure few settings for the HackerRank screen. To do this:

  1. Log in to the HackerRank platform.
  2. On the upper-right corner, click on your profile icon.
  3. Click Settings.
  4. On the left pane, click Integrations and scroll to the LinkedIn Talent Hub option.
  5. Click Integrate. The integration page for LinkedIn Talent Hub is displayed.
  6. You can select options to set up the authorization for HackerRank Screen or HackerRank interviews. You can also set the validity period for assessments shared with the candidates.

Authorizing LinkedIn Integration with HackerRank Interviews

When configuring the LinkedIn integration with HackerRank Interviews for the first time, the company administrator must authorize the integration.

The procedure is similar to Authorizing LinkedIn Integration with HackerRank Screen.

After you authorize the integration, the HackerRank Interviews is displayed in the Video Interviewing section of the Authorized integrations on the LinkedIn Talent Hub platform.
